channel.title: Mypos and noclip help?
channel.description:
Hey guys,
I'm pretty new to all this so I need some help. I just started experimenting with the linked source for a while and I need a ::mypos command added. I also need a ::noclip command added so I can add things easier.
If anyone can help it would be greatly appreciated! :D
Source --> [url=https://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,642681.0.html]https://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,642681.0.html[/url]

@TexasRagerRS wrote:

Both working now, much appreciated!

item.title: Mypos and noclip help?
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

No clip is client sided, not server sided. Look there.

Read full topic

item.title: Mypos and noclip help?
item.dc:creator: @TexasRagerRS TexasRagerRS
item.description:
@TexasRagerRS wrote:

[quote=“iz3 legend, post:2, topic:526836”]A position checking command but your server should already have one.

if (playerCommand.equals("mypos") {
     c.sendMessage("X: " + c.absX + " Y: " + c.absY);
}

No clipping commands are usually handled client sided but are disabled in most refactored clients. Either un-comment the command if its there, or pull it from another client if its not.[/quote]

Ah just found the original source and did some good ole’ copy n’ paste. Still need the noclip though, but i’ll be alright without it for now. Thanks for helping!

Read full topic

item.title: Mypos and noclip help?
item.dc:creator: @iz3_legend iz3 legend
item.description:
@iz3_legend wrote:

A position checking command but your server should already have one.

if (playerCommand.equals("mypos") {
     c.sendMessage("X: " + c.absX + " Y: " + c.absY);
}

No clipping commands are usually handled client sided but are disabled in most refactored clients. Either un-comment the command if its there, or pull it from another client if its not.

Read full topic
